name: test
notes:
A long list of topics were raised and I took a time to ramble at large about all of them at once. Apologies for not taking the time to be more succinct, but at least each topic has a header so you can skip stuff you don't care about.

### Maintainability

It's simply not true to say that I don't care about maintainability. I still work on the oldest Rails app in the world.
